lemma map_map_rexp:
  "map_rexp f (map_rexp g r) = map_rexp (\<lambda>r. f (g r)) r"
lemma atoms_lang: "w : lang r \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms r"

lemma lang_eq_ext: "(lang r = lang s) =
  (\<forall>w \<in> lists(atoms r \<union> atoms s). w \<in> lang r \<longleftrightarrow> w \<in> lang s)"

lemma lang_eq_ext_Nil_fold_Deriv:
  fixes r s
  defines "\<BB> \<equiv> {(fold Deriv w (lang r), fold Deriv w (lang s))| w. w\<in>lists (atoms r \<union> atoms s)}"
  shows "lang r = lang s \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>(K, L) \<in> \<BB>. [] \<in> K \<longleftrightarrow> [] \<in> L)"
lemma le_rexp_Zero: "le_rexp r Zero \<Longrightarrow> r = Zero"
lemma le_rexp_antisym: "\<lbrakk>le_rexp r s; le_rexp s r\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> r = s"
lemma le_rexp_trans: "\<lbrakk>le_rexp r s; le_rexp s t\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> le_rexp r t"
lemma le_rexp_total: "le_rexp (r :: 'a :: linorder rexp) s \<or> le_rexp s r"
translations: lemma nullable_iff [code_abbrev]: "nullable r \<longleftrightarrow> [] \<in> lang r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. nullable r = ([] \<in> lang r)
by (induct r) (auto simp add: conc_def split: if_splits)

primrec rexp_empty where
  "rexp_empty Zero \<longleftrightarrow> True"
| "rexp_empty One \<longleftrightarrow> False"
| "rexp_empty (Atom a) \<longleftrightarrow> False"
| "rexp_empty (Plus r s) \<longleftrightarrow> rexp_empty r \<and> rexp_empty s"
| "rexp_empty (Times r s) \<longleftrightarrow> rexp_empty r \<or> rexp_empty s"
| "rexp_empty (Star r) \<longleftrightarrow> False"
(* TODO Fixme: This code_abbrev rule does not work. Why? *)
lemma rexp_empty_iff [code_abbrev]: "rexp_empty r \<longleftrightarrow> lang r = {}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rexp_empty r = (lang r = {})
by (induction r) auto
text\<open>Composition on rhs usually complicates matters:\<close>

lemma map_map_rexp:
  "map_rexp f (map_rexp g r) = map_rexp (\<lambda>r. f (g r)) r"

proof (prove)

unfolding rexp.map_comp o_def

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. map_rexp (\<lambda>x. f (g x)) r = map_rexp (\<lambda>r. f (g r)) r
lemma map_rexp_ident[simp]: "map_rexp (\<lambda>x. x) = (\<lambda>r. r)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. map_rexp (\<lambda>x. x) = (\<lambda>r. r)
unfolding id_def[symmetric] fun_eq_iff rexp.map_id id_apply

proof (prove)

lemma atoms_lang: "w : lang r \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms r"

proof (prove)

 1. w \<in> lang r \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms r

       w \<in> lang Zero \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms Zero
 2. \<And>w. w \<in> lang One \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms One
 3. \<And>x w.
       w \<in> lang (Atom x) \<Longrightarrow>
       set w \<subseteq> atoms (Atom x)
 4. \<And>r1 r2 w.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>w.
                   w \<in> lang r1 \<Longrightarrow>
                   set w \<subseteq> atoms r1;
        \<And>w.
           w \<in> lang r2 \<Longrightarrow> set w \<subseteq> atoms r2;

        w \<in> lang (Times r1 r2)\<rbrakk>

 6. \<And>r w.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>w.

lemma lang_eq_ext: "(lang r = lang s) =
  (\<forall>w \<in> lists(atoms r \<union> atoms s). w \<in> lang r \<longleftrightarrow> w \<in> lang s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (lang r = lang s) =
    (\<forall>w\<in>lists (atoms r \<union> atoms s).
        (w \<in> lang r) = (w \<in> lang s))
by (auto simp: atoms_lang[unfolded subset_iff])

lemma lang_eq_ext_Nil_fold_Deriv:
  fixes r s
  defines "\<BB> \<equiv> {(fold Deriv w (lang r), fold Deriv w (lang s))| w. w\<in>lists (atoms r \<union> atoms s)}"
  shows "lang r = lang s \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>(K, L) \<in> \<BB>. [] \<in> K \<longleftrightarrow> [] \<in> L)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (lang r = lang s) =
    (\<forall>(K, L)\<in>\<BB>. ([] \<in> K) = ([] \<in> L))
unfolding lang_eq_ext \<BB>_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>w\<in>lists (atoms r \<union> atoms s).
        (w \<in> lang r) = (w \<in> lang s)) =
    (\<forall>(K, L)
              \<in>{(fold Deriv w (lang r), fold Deriv w (lang s)) |w.
                    w \<in> lists (atoms r \<union> atoms s)}.
        ([] \<in> K) = ([] \<in> L))
by (subst (1 2) in_fold_Deriv[of "[]", simplified, symmetric]) auto
subsection \<open>Term ordering\<close>

instantiation rexp :: (order) "{order}"
begin

fun le_rexp :: "('a::order) rexp \<Rightarrow> ('a::order) rexp \<Rightarrow> bool"
where
  "le_rexp Zero _ = True"
| "le_rexp _ Zero = False"
| "le_rexp One _ = True"
| "le_rexp _ One = False"
| "le_rexp (Atom a) (Atom b) = (a <= b)"
| "le_rexp (Atom _) _ = True"
| "le_rexp _ (Atom _) = False"
| "le_rexp (Star r) (Star s) = le_rexp r s"
| "le_rexp (Star _) _ = True"
| "le_rexp _ (Star _) = False"
| "le_rexp (Plus r r') (Plus s s') =
    (if r = s then le_rexp r' s' else le_rexp r s)"
| "le_rexp (Plus _ _) _ = True"
| "le_rexp _ (Plus _ _) = False"
| "le_rexp (Times r r') (Times s s') =
    (if r = s then le_rexp r' s' else le_rexp r s)"
(* The class instance stuff is by Dmitriy Traytel *)
definition less_eq_rexp where "r \<le> s \<equiv> le_rexp r s"
definition less_rexp where "r < s \<equiv> le_rexp r s \<and> r \<noteq> s"
lemma le_rexp_Zero: "le_rexp r Zero \<Longrightarrow> r = Zero"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.le_rexp r Zero \<Longrightarrow> r = Zero
by (induction r) auto
lemma le_rexp_refl: "le_rexp r r"

proof (prove)

lemma le_rexp_antisym: "\<lbrakk>le_rexp r s; le_rexp s r\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> r = s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp r s; local.le_rexp s r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> r = s
by (induction r s rule: le_rexp.induct) (auto dest: le_rexp_Zero)
lemma le_rexp_trans: "\<lbrakk>le_rexp r s; le_rexp s t\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> le_rexp r t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp r s; local.le_rexp s t\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp r t
proof (induction r s arbitrary: t rule: le_rexp.induct)

proof (state)
goal (31 subgoals):
 1. \<And>uu_ t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp Zero uu_; local.le_rexp uu_ t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp Zero t
 2. \<And>t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp One Zero; local.le_rexp Zero t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp One t
 3. \<And>v t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp (Atom v) Zero; local.le_rexp Zero t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp (Atom v) t
 4. \<And>v va t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp (Plus v va) Zero;
        local.le_rexp Zero t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp (Plus v va) t
 5. \<And>v va t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp (Times v va) Zero;
        local.le_rexp Zero t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp (Times v va) t
 6. \<And>v t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp (Star v) Zero; local.le_rexp Zero t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp (Star v) t
 7. \<And>t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp One One; local.le_rexp One t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp One t
 8. \<And>v t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp One (Atom v);
        local.le_rexp (Atom v) t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp One t
 9. \<And>v va t.
       \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp One (Plus v va);
        local.le_rexp (Plus v va) t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp One t
 10. \<And>v va t.
        \<lbrakk>local.le_rexp One (Times v va);
         local.le_rexp (Times v va) t\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> local.le_rexp One t
